power.title: Arcana Ward
power.fluff: Your god's comprehension of arcane mysteries extends to shielding you from elemental forces

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by an attack that deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of:
acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder
You gain resist 5 against the chosen damage type until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Reist 10.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Resist 15.

power.title: Changing Tides of the Moon
power.fluff: You glow with the healing light of the moon, with the light waxing and waning for a time

section.name: Target:
section.target: you or one ally; the target must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains hit points equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
At the start of each of your turns, roll a d8.
If the roll is odd, the target regains hit points equal to the roll. If the target already has more temporary hit points, this effect ends.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to twice the roll.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to three times the roll.
If the roll is even, the target regains hit points equal to the roll, and this effect ends.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to twice the roll.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to three times the roll.

power.title: Cloak of Winter
power.fluff: At your prayer, you and your allies endure winter's chill

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains resist 5 cold until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Resist 10 cold.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Resist 15 cold.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can choose to expend this power when you finish an extended rest.

If you do, you can't regain the use of this power until the end of your next extended rest, and instead of the normal effects, each target gains a +5 power bonus to Endurance checks to resist environmental cold and can roll twice on such checks.

power.title: Creation Secret
power.fluff: Your prayer has a chance of extending the magic contained within an item

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You use a magic item's daily power

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Roll a d20.
If you roll 10 or higher, the triggering daily power recharges as part of your next short rest.

power.title: Cycle of Change
power.fluff: With your god's help, you move the burden to where it can be borne with ease

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You transfer one effect that a save can end from the target to yourself, or vice versa.

power.title: Darkness Consumes
power.fluff: You cause darkness to swirl around you and your allies for a moment

section.name: Target:
section.target: You and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains concealment until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Death Knell
power.fluff: Death comes to all, and your god counts on you to hasten the moment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target's current hit points are equal to 5 + one-half your level or fewer, it dies.
Otherwise, this power is expended but it does not count against your limit of one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

power.title: Divine Excellence
power.fluff: Your prayer inspires excellence in yourself and your allies

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a skill check and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to the triggering skill check.
You activate an Aura 10 (Divine) until the end of your next turn.
You and allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to skill checks using the triggering skill.

power.title: Earth Hold
power.fluff: For a few moments, you give yourself up to your god's hold, causing those around you to sense the divine presence as fearsome gravity

section.name: Target:
section.target: You, and each enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You are immobilized until the end of your next turn, and reduce forced movement against you by 3 squares.
Target enemies are slowed until the end of your next turn. If a target was already slowed, it is immobilized instead.

power.title: Embrace the Battle
power.fluff: You encourage your friends to throw themselves into glorious battle

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls and takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn. A bloodied ally's bonus to attack rolls increases to +3.

power.title: Fate Rolls On
power.fluff: In your god's presence, what was mere luck becomes destiny

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature within 5 squares of you succeeds or fails at a saving throw

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target failed the triggering saving throw, it takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes before the end of the encounter.
If the target succeeded on the triggering saving throw, it gains a +2 bonus to the first saving throw it makes before the end of the encounter.

power.title: Grasp of the Wild
power.fluff: You cause the environment to clutch at creatures in an area, vines wrapping around them, the earth softening under them, water churning about them - whatever is natural for the environ

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of clutching terrain until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain. Squares of difficult terrain from natural sources instead become greater difficult terrain.

power.title: Hope Remains
power.fluff: Those who rise again fight with renewed vigor

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within 10 squares; the character regains consciousness after being reduced to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and all defenses until the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.

power.title: Immediate Justice
power.fluff: You enforce balance with a flare of divine energy that lances your enemy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 10 squares reduces your ally to 0 hit points or fewer or damages your unconscious ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes radiant damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.

power.title: Imminent Luck
power.fluff: Your god gives you another chance at good fortune

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You use a power that allows you to reroll a roll, and the new roll is lower than the original roll

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain the use of the triggering power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Loving Sacrifice
power.fluff: The loving tie between you and your friend allows you to take some of the pain he or she would have suffered alone

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 squares of you takes damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes up 10 less damage from the triggering damage source, and you take the damage that the target didn't take. The damage to you cannot be prevented or reduced in any way.

power.title: Master of Tyranny
power.fluff: Your enemies' weakness gives you strength

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied creatures until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Motivated Protection
power.fluff: You ensure that a moment of respite is not interrupted

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within 5 squares; the character uses his or her second wind

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +3 power bonus to all defenses until the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.

power.title: Original Poison
power.fluff: Your prayer empowers your venomous attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls with Poison powers. This increases to a +4 bonus if the power deals no damage.

power.title: Path of Freedom
power.fluff: Through your prayer, you remind your friends that they are always truly free

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target can choose to either make an escape attempt as a free reaction, or to make a saving throw against an immobilizing, restraining, or slowing effect that a save can end.

power.title: Perfect Torment
power.fluff: Your prayer prolongs your enemies' suffering

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn. This penalty increases to -4 for the first saving throw the target makes against ongoing damage.

power.title: Power of Destruction
power.fluff: A snarled prayer is enough to invoke the destructive power of your god

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll damage for a melee attack and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering damage roll and use either result.

power.title: Pulse of Life
power.fluff: In the mortal world, death cannot be entirely denied, but it can be postponed

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature within 10 squares of you makes a death saving throw

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +10 power bonus to the triggering death saving throw.

power.title: Screaming Madness
power.fluff: Ambushed by your dread god's madness, your enemy lurches into lunacy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first enemy you hit with a Fear attack during your current turn is stricken with lunacy.
While it is stricken, the first time it makes an attack, it also makes a melee basic attack as a free reaction against itself and automatically hits.

power.title: Sea Surge
power.fluff: Your prayer calls forth a wave to carry an ally back into position

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within 10 squares; The character is pushed, pulled, or slid

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 3 squares.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Slide up to 4 squares.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Slide up to 5 squares.

power.title: Small Vengeance
power.fluff: You channel your god's essence and return pain to your foe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 10 squares of you bloodies you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes 1d8 damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2d8 damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 3d8 damage.

power.title: Solar Enemy
power.fluff: The divine sunlight playing across your enemies is a sign of the radiance to come

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains vulnerable 5 radiant until the end of your next turn. If the target already has vulnerable radiant, its vulnerable instead increases by 5.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Vulnerable 7 radiant.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Vulnerable 10 radiant.

power.title: Sovereign Justice
power.fluff: Through your allies' exploits, you can attain victory even if you yourself fail

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy damages you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 6 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.
If the triggering attack bloodied you, increase the temporary hit points by 5, or by 10 if the triggering attack reduced you to 0 hit points or fewer.

power.title: Storm Sacrifice
power.fluff: If it is your god's will, the coming storm will strike as a blessing

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one creature in range

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain vulnerable 5 lightning and vulnerable 5 thunder until the end of your next turn.
The target creature loses its resist lightning and resist thunder until the end of your next turn. If it does not have one, it instead gains vulnerable 5 to that damage type.

power.title: Strength of the Gods
power.fluff: From your god, to your ally, and into the enemy; a passage of strength and impact

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a power bonus to the first damage roll, Athletics check, or Strength check it makes before the end of your next turn. The power bonus equals your Strength modifier for a damage roll, or 1 + one-half your Strength modifier for an Athletics check or Strength check (minimum +2 bonus).

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The power bonus to damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The power bonus to damage increases to 4 + your Strength modifier.

power.title: Sudden Strife
power.fluff: You sow doubt in two enemies, causing them to question each other's loyalty, which leads to their combat acumen suffering

section.name: Target:
section.target: two enemies within 3 squares of each other

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the targets have the following to effects:
The targets cannot flank with each other.
The targets take a -4 penalty to all attack rolls and Perception checks while they are within 3 squares of each other.

power.title: Sure Knowledge
power.fluff: Some portion of your god's wisdom flows through you or your ally

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You, or an ally within 5 squares; the character makes a knowledge check and dislikes the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target rerolls the triggering knowledge check, but must use the second result.

power.title: Trickster's Fortune
power.fluff: You slyly twist your foe's fate and try to turn its misfortune into your fortune

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within 5 squares of you would make a saving throw

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering saving throw.
If the target fails the triggering saving throw, you or an ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

power.title: Undeath's Ally
power.fluff: At your touch, a friend's life begins to slip away, but she gains some of the resilience of undeath

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target loses a healing surge. If the target has no healing surges remaining, it takes damage equal to one-half its bloodied value.
The target gains temporary hit points equal his or her healing surge value + one-half your level. While it has these temporary hit points, it has a +2 power to saving throws against Necrotic effects.
